description: While sitting by the fire Violet Monroe and her not so adventurous boyfriend agree to write down their sexual fantasies and read them to each other. It turns out Violet's list is much more risque than her boyfriend's. Turned on by her dirty desires- he agrees to organize a fantasy gang bang with a bunch of his friends. Violet's wish comes true when she is abducted and taken to the middle of nowhere and fucked by 5 guys in all of her holes at once. Squirting, DP!
title: Intimate desires revealed- this young couple goes all out!
